attributes.imagesize: '''House Poole''' is a vassal house of the North. They serve House Stark of Winterfell.==Known members==*Vayon Poole, Steward of Winterfell. Executed by redcloaks during the purge of the Stark household.** Jeyne Poole, his daughter.** Four other daughters<ref>"Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things"</ref>==Family tree==House Poole family tree==In the books==In the ''A Song of Ice and Fire'' novels, House Poole is a lesser house in service of House Stark of Winterfell. Their sigil is a blue plate on white, with a grey tressure. No mention is made in the books of Jeyne having four sisters, which is stated in the TV series, though the books never said Jeyne was an only child.==See also==* AWOIAF (MAJOR spoilers from the books)==References==ReflistNorth HousesCategory:Vassal houses
attributes.title: House Poole
attributes.sigil: A blue plate on white, with a grey tressure

'''House Poole''' is a vassal house of [[the North]]. They serve [[House Stark]] of [[Winterfell]].
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, House Poole is a lesser house in service of [[House Stark]] of [[Winterfell]]. Their sigil is a blue plate on white, with a grey tressure. No mention is made in the books of Jeyne having four sisters, which is stated in the TV series, though the books never said Jeyne was an only child.
